channel.title: Steel Industry on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Steel Industry on FinanClub

item.title: X
item.description: score:-11 Chances: Nippon Steel Corp. has made an aggressive all-cash offer for United States Steel Corp, propelling the Japanese company into the lead in the final hours of a bidding war for the iconic American steelmaker. The deal price of $55 per share represented a whopping 142% premium to the last trading day before the bidding war started.
